Artistic Technics,
Computation & Sound Design

I’m an interdisciplinary artist and engineer based in Berlin. I combine my love for music, technology, and design to craft immersive experiences. Drawing from my background in chemical engineering, I treat creative processes like intricate systems—shaping both the sonic and the visual world. My main interest at the moment is interdisciplinary problem solving and the intersection of art and technology.
